title: Getting Started
para1: Before you are able to found your MegaCorp, you are going to need a few paltry resources.
para2: Your first goal is to produce a bucket of Money, which is the primary currency used by MegaCorps.
para3: To get this, you will need to use a Small Business Simulator, which converts emeralds and gold into Money.
para4: Once you have the Money, then you can craft the MegaCorp Uplink, and found your MegaCorp!
